title: Silicon nanowire/ionic hydrogel-based hybrid moist-electric generators with enhanced voltage output and operational stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00171K, Paper
Wenjing Duan, Beibei Shao, Zhiqi Wang, Kun Ni, Shanfei Liu, Xianrong Yuan, Yusheng Wang, Baoquan Sun, Xiaohong Zhang, Ruiyuan Liu
An organic–inorganic hybrid moist-electric generator outputs a voltage of 1.28 V and retains 60% of the peak performance after 800 hours’ operation.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
